subject: How Was Your Stay? We’d Love Your Feedback!

content.value:
Hi Oliver, we hope you enjoyed your stay! Please take a moment to review your experience. Here’s the link: https://www.split.lease/version-test/api/1.1/login-link?key=1742487854238x170556649035288320. Thanks for your feedback!
